text: Allaha akasanca ani jaminica nura (prakasa) ahe. Tyacya nurace udaharana ase ki janu ekhadya konadyata diva ahe ani to diva kacecya (kandilacya) ata asava. Kaca cakakatana, lakhkha camakanarya taryasamana asava ani to diva pavitra vrksa jaitunacya telane prajvalita kela jata asava, jo vrksa na purvekadaca ahe, na pascimekadaca ani te tela prakasamana honyacya betata asave agine tyala kadhi sparsa kela nasala tari. Prakasavara prakasa ahe. Sarvasrestha allaha apalya nuracya disene jyala icchito margadarsana karato. Lokanna samajavanyakarita allaha he udaharana deta ahe ani allaha pratyeka gostici avastha cangalya prakare janato
